overview_summary: All five profiled neighbors have no documented stance on the development (all classified as 'unknown'). Four of the five are high-influence stakeholders (major corporations or government bodies), with the remaining one being a moderately influential private landowner.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via NorthWestern's government affairs office; emphasize grid reliability benefits.

neighbors.name: State Of Montana Fbo State Fish & Game Commission

approach_recommendations.engage: Coordinate with Montana FWP and inform the Commission early; address habitat protection measures upfront.
Work with the Montana DNRC (Trust Lands) on leasing/permitting; highlight revenue to schools and proper land stewardship.
Engage the regional FWP office; ensure that any wildlife and public access concerns are thoroughly addressed.
